official_title: A bill to authorize construction of the flood control project on the Zumbro River at Rochester, Minnesota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a flood control project on the Zumbro River at Rochester, Minnesota. Requires that certain changes be accomplished entirely at Federal expense.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of the flood control project on the Zumbro River at Rochester, Minnesota.
